title: Avanquest Video Explosion HD Ultimate 7.7.0
description:
Thanks to Video Explosion HD Ultimate you can easily make all kinds of high-definition movies. This easy-to-use and powerful tool allows you to go into the smallest details of the video you are making. Choose duration, colors, contrasts. Add multiple custom light effects and filters, dynamic transitions, titles and music backgrounds. Customize the texts in 3D, add the progressive zoom or a rain effect! The Ultimate version also allows you to perform multi-track editing, advanced playback and provides you with 1500 additional sound effects and video to embellish your videos!
If you want software with advanced video editing features, but at the same time easy to use, Video Explosion HD Ultimate is the ideal solution! Picto captureThis tool allows you to create videos with extreme precision thanks to the different editing tracks and the great variety of multimedia effects available and to create quality movies that you can then show your audience.

Data import
- Acquisition of audio and video files from a video camera, PC, Internet or FTP (wide choice of formats)
- Adding videos recorded with webcam
- Importing files with copy-paste function

Editing videos with the addition of numerous multimedia effects
- Special 3D effects and filters: cinema clap, old movies, fireworks ...
- Automatic adaptation of the music to the duration of the video
- Wide choice of dynamic transition effects: progressive zoom, traveling, backgrounds ...
- Image function-in the image
- Edit video clips: duration, colors, contrasts
- Adding photos
- Titles and animated texts in 3D customizable
- Over 1500 sound effects and video available: photo effects, masks ...

Export in High Definition
- Numerous export formats: MPEG-1/2/4, DivX, WMV, Xvid and AVI
- Video creation up to 1080pPicto partage
- Burning on CD and DVD
